tool_description: This API can be used to get the current price of Brent crude oil price in US dollars.
name: Brent Crude Oil Price
title: Brent Crude Oil Price

api_list.name: latest
api_list.description: Gives the latest Brent crude oil price in USD.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brent-crude-oil-price.p.rapidapi.com/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brent-crude-oil-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://brent-crude-oil-price.p.rapidapi.com/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brent-crude-oil-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
